theses.description: Array of thesis statements generated for individuals in the organization

individual_id.description: The UUID of the individual from the individuals table. This will be used to associate the thesis with the correct person in the database.

contrarian_level.description: The contrarian level (1-10) this thesis belongs to. 1 = mainstream industry view, 10 = radically contrarian, boundary-pushing perspective.

thesis_html.description: The actual thesis statement attributed to this individual, formatted as HTML. MUST use ONLY valid HTML tags, NEVER use Markdown syntax. Should be 1 short sentence that captures their unique perspective on the contrarian idea. Must sound natural and authentic to how this person would speak based on their background and content.

thesis_supporting_evidence_html.description: One sentence explaining the evidence or credibility behind this thesis. MUST use ONLY valid HTML tags (e.g., <strong>, <em>). NEVER use Markdown syntax. Reference specific content, data, experience, or work from this individual that supports the thesis. Always in English.
